page.title: 12WILDEN PARISH CHURCH.
page.content: Yesterday we visited St. Nicholas Church. Rev. Griffith met us there and took us in. It was built in 1340. We saw the Sanctuary knob on the door. Next we saw the font in the nave. Rev. let us stand in the pulpit where he gives people a talking to from. In the children's corner there's an old chest with 1635 on it. I saw a corn cross on the side of the organ that Mrs. Archer had made. We were aloud to play the organ, but we weren't very good. In the vestry, the Rector showed us the Registers. There had been one funeral and two weddings this year. I saw my name in there too. Not the wedding one. The Baptism one. We saw the chalice and patten too. There's an owl carved above the door to the belfry. It's very old. Our church is really lovely.It's small and friendly.
